name: Mana Spring
effects: Grants +1 mana for 1 turn when stepped on

name: Shadow Creep
effects: Deals 1 damage to enemy minions at end of turn; damage scales with number of Shadow Creep tiles on battlefield

name: Hallowed Ground
effects: Heals 1 HP to friendly minions at end of turn

name: Exhuming Sand
effects: Spawns an Iron Dervish on this tile when you summon another minion (does not trigger on own creation)

name: Primal Flourish
effects: Grants +2/+2 permanently to friendly minions standing on it (Grow aura)

name: Frostfire Chest
effects: Grants a Holiday Gift card when stepped on (special event tile)
